description: Retrieves information of a node (also called a instance interchangeably) of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The string name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster in which the node is.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster node.

nested_items.name: NodeDetails
nested_items.description: The details of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster node.

nested_items.name: InstanceGroupName
nested_items.description: The instance group name in which the instance is.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the instance.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of an instance in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message from an instance in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The type of the instance.

nested_items.name: LaunchTime
nested_items.description: The time when the instance is launched.

nested_items.name: LastSoftwareUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the cluster was last updated.

nested_items.name: LifeCycleConfig
nested_items.description: The LifeCycle configuration applied to the instance.

nested_items.name: SourceS3Uri
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 bucket path where your lifecycle scripts are stored.

nested_items.name: OnCreate
nested_items.description: The file name of the entrypoint script of lifecycle scripts under SourceS3Uri. This entrypoint script runs during cluster creation.

nested_items.name: OverrideVpcConfig
nested_items.description: The customized Amazon VPC configuration at the instance group level that overrides the default Amazon VPC configuration of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs, in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. Specify the security groups for the VPC that is specified in the Subnets field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC to which you want to connect your training job or model. For information about the availability of specific instance types, see Supported Instance Types and Availability Zones.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ThreadsPerCore
nested_items.description: The number of threads per CPU core you specified under CreateCluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceStorageConfigs
nested_items.description: The configurations of additional storage specified to the instance group where the instance (node) is launched.

nested_items.name: EbsVolumeConfig
nested_items.description: Defines the configuration for attaching additional Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) volumes to the instances in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group. The additional EBS volume is attached to each instance within the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group and mounted to /opt/sagemaker.

nested_items.name: VolumeSizeInGB
nested_items.description: The size in gigabytes (GB) of the additional EBS volume to be attached to the instances in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group. The additional EBS volume is attached to each instance within the SageMaker HyperPod cluster instance group and mounted to /opt/sagemaker.

nested_items.name: PrivatePrimaryIp
nested_items.description: The private primary IP address of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster node.

nested_items.name: PrivatePrimaryIpv6
nested_items.description: The private primary IPv6 address of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster node when configured with an Amazon VPC that supports IPv6 and includes subnets with IPv6 addressing enabled in either the cluster Amazon VPC configuration or the instance group Amazon VPC configuration.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsHostname
nested_items.description: The private DNS hostname of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster node.

nested_items.name: Placement
nested_items.description: The placement details of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster node.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone where the node in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster is launched.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the Availability Zone where the node in the SageMaker HyperPod cluster is launched.
